QuestData.Title: Grek's Crazy Night
QuestData.Description: Grek had bad night last night.$B$BShiny mummy man came into Grek's house and told Grek that he had to go to Mana Tombs in Auchindoun. But Grek still trying to read wanted poster!$B$B<Grek's face lights up.>$B$BGrek knows! You go find shiny mummy man and tell him Grek sent you. It perfect plan!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Artificer Morphalius in the Mana Tombs in Auchindoun.
